C1 considered to be holy and deserving respect, especially because of a connection with a god: sacred relics/temples This area is sacred to the Apaches.
C1 connected with religion: sacred music/writings
C2 considered too important to be changed: His daily routine is absolutely sacred to him.humorous They proposed changing the name of the team - is nothing sacred?
